headline: Business People: Coborn’s exec David Best tapped to lead Cub Foods
summary: FOOD United Natural Foods, a Rhode Island-based grocery wholesaler, announced the appointment of David Best as president and chief executive officer of Retail, effective Aug. 17, leading the company’s two retail banners, Stillwater-based Cub Foods and Shoppers Food Warehouse. Best previously was president and chief operating officer of Coborn’s, St. Cloud, and also held executive positions at ...
